item.title: About
item.description: I’m a Site Reliability Engineer based in London, UK. After spending most of my career in telecoms, I find myself working in the fintech space, which brings with it a different set of challenges for both the development and the operational management of the platforms I am responsible for. Common stack these days includes: AWS Kubernetes Prometheus Go Linux Outside of the office, I’m getting into photography and enjoy drinking in the history of London and the rest of the UK, as well as travel throughout Europe.

item.title: Links
item.description: A collection of links to my favourite sites, subscriptions and content. Favorite sites Hacker News
